text: Six months since going public with rape accusations about Harvey Weinstein and helping to ignite the # MeToo movement, McGowan has been portrayed as both a fearless hero and flame - throwing narcissist. Now, as her E! docuseries returns and she battles a cocaine charge ( she says it's a setup ), the actress - activist opens up about why she helped torpedo her story on NBC ( ` ` I'd heard about Lauer'' ) and her decision to leave Hollywood : ` ` I've been a lot happier in this last month than I have been in a long time.'' Rose McGowan is camped out at Brother Jimmy's BBQ, a divey New York institution across the street from Penn Station, waiting for her
